summary.para: Gets the number of metadata items within the reader.

param.name: pcCount
param.para: Type: UINT*
Pointer that receives the number of metadata items within the reader.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets an enumerator of all the metadata items.

param.name: ppIEnumMetadata
param.para: Type: **
Pointer that receives a pointer to the metadata enumerator.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the metadata format associated with the reader.

param.name: pguidMetadataFormat
param.para: Type: GUID*
Pointer that receives the metadata format GUID.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the metadata handler info associated with the reader.

param.name: ppIHandler
param.para: Type: **
Pointer that receives a pointer to the .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: pvarSchema
param.para: Type: const *
Pointer to the metadata item's schema property.

param.name: pvarId
param.para: Type: const *
Pointer to the metadata item's id.

param.name: pvarValue
param.para: Type: *
Pointer that receives the metadata value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the metadata item at the given index.

param.name: nIndex
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the metadata item to retrieve.

param.name: pvarSchema
param.para: Type: *
Pointer that receives the schema property.

param.name: pvarId
param.para: Type: *
Pointer that receives the id property.

param.name: pvarValue

Pointer that receives the metadata value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide access to underlining metadata content. This interface is implemented by independent software vendors (ISVs) to create new metadata readers.

remarks.para: A metadata reader can be used to access metadata blocks and items within a metadata block instead of using a query reader. To directly access the metadata reader, query a decoder or its frames for the interface to enumerate each metadata reader.

member.seealso: Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata
